ideas.mix_concept: Creative Best Of mix featuring the best moments from No Agenda Episode 1779. This mix will capture the essence of the show with carefully selected segments and AI-generated music.
music_prompts: Upbeat electronic podcast intro music with energetic synth melody, 128 BPM, perfect for highlighting the best moments
Energetic best of transition music with podcast energy, 125 BPM
Atmospheric best of outro music with thoughtful undertones, 110 BPM
